notable_quotes: Next time, tell me well in advance, would be interesting to learn more more about Trump.

International figure seeking information through Epstein

public_knowledge.context: Thorbj√∏rn Jagland was a prominent Norwegian politician who served as Secretary General of the Council of Europe. This email shows Epstein's connections to international political figures and his perceived access to information about Donald Trump.

analysis.summary: Thorbjon Jagland responds to Jeffrey Epstein's email from Paris, noting he is in Norway and expresses frustration about short notice while showing interest in learning more about Trump from Epstein, stating he is 'totally confused' about the situation.
